title: Drawing, ""The Foliage of Berenice:" from Callimachus"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: On recto: la chioma di berenice.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: The Foliage of Bernice: From Callimachus. Two Bacae.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ""The Foliage of Berenice:" from Callimachus".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2075.
